response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. We understand its significance to you, valued at $1,500,000. Considering this, we propose to offer it to you at an exceptional price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving for you while ensuring a fair return for us. We believe this offer strikes the right balance between value and cost, making it an attractive proposition for both parties. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
